column5: Did a dump run today and decided to go back through Vermilion Bay and have a look at eagle.Very dark and would think a couple of more days and she,ll open up.Bit early but within the normall time frame.Hope to go out with my wife mon/teus and troll and jig for some lakers.Boat is pretty much ready to go.
So are locals allowed to go out and fish? I thought this wasn't allowed?

As i wrote earlier we are governed by southern ontario.Around 2500 km from my place to toronto.So some launches have been closed there and none here so far as i know.Ontario started opening up stores and stuff today so iam thinking as long as we fish with people from our own house its all right.I normally dont use pubk5ic launches to begin with.
Trying to pick a good day as its cool and windy.wife likes warm,sunny and calm.Will post if i get out sometime this week.
